title: ‘Gargoyles’ Live-Action Series In The Works At Disney Plus
description:
Disney’s animated series Gargoyles originally ran from 1994 to 1997. In the years since, it’s become a cult classic with mainstream appeal. Now the popularity of the series has prompted Disney to greenlight a live-action Gargoyles series for Disney Plus. As shared via THR, Gary Dauberman and James Wan’s Atomic Monster will team up to […]

title: Martin Scorsese Reveals Horror Movie That Made Him Unable To Sleep
description:
Due to his filmmaking history, comments made by Martin Scorsese are rarely taken lightly. This can be seen with responses to his comments regarding Marvel and the state of cinema today.
